docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton urged prayers for the families of the victims of police shootings and for the Dallas police officers who were killed, calling for a “just accounting” for the violence of the week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton urged prayers for the families of the victims of police shootings and for the Dallas police officers who were killed, calling for a “just accounting” for the violence of the week.

headline.main: 4 Young Chess Masters Tackle a Persistent Puzzle: The Gender Gap
headline.print_headline: Four Young Masters Tackle a Chess Puzzle: The Gender Gap

docs.snippet: It is one of the vexing questions in the game: Why are boys and men so much more prominent than their female counterparts?...
docs.abstract: Only four of nation's top 14 young chess masters at elite clinic at New York's Marshall Chess Club are girls, highlighting enduring and puzzling gender gap that persists in game.
docs.lead_paragraph: It is one of the vexing questions in the game: Why are boys and men so much more prominent than their female counterparts?

headline.main: Violence Again Convulses 2016 Election Campaign, Testing Trump, Clinton
headline.print_headline: Violence Again Convulses 2016 Election Campaign, Testing Trump, Clinton

docs.snippet: In the hours after a gunman shot 12 police officers, killing five in Dallas, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton abruptly canceled campaign events. Their Twitter accounts largely went quiet....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the hours after a gunman shot 12 police officers, killing five in Dallas, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump and his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton abruptly canceled campaign events. Their Twitter accounts largely went quiet.

headline.main: Beyond Dallas, Police Come Under Fire in Three Other States
headline.print_headline: Beyond Dallas, Police Come Under Fire in Three Other States

docs.snippet: Police came under fire in three states on Thursday and Friday, authorities said, possibly prompted by the same motivation behind the rampage in Dallas: police use of force against black people....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police came under fire in three states on Thursday and Friday, authorities said, possibly prompted by the same motivation behind the rampage in Dallas: police use of force against black people.

docs.snippet: The day after a shooting that left five officers dead, Gov. Greg Abbott commended the work of the Dallas Police Department and Dallas Area Rapid Transit officers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The day after a shooting that left five officers dead, Gov. Greg Abbott commended the work of the Dallas Police Department and Dallas Area Rapid Transit officers.

headline.main: Gender Identity Church Language Revised in State Brochure
headline.print_headline: Gender Identity Church Language Revised in State Brochure

docs.snippet: An Iowa Civil Rights Commission brochure that some churches interpreted to mean they must abide by transgender bathroom rules has been changed....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Iowa Civil Rights Commission brochure that some churches interpreted to mean they must abide by transgender bathroom rules has been changed.

headline.main: Uruguay Wins Dispute With Tobacco Giant Philip Morris
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Wins Dispute With Tobacco Giant Philip Morris

docs.snippet: Tobacco giant Philip Morris has lost an international dispute surrounding the sale of cigarettes in Uruguay and must continue to cover packs sold in the South American country with graphic warning labels and restrict its branding practices, Presid...
docs.lead_paragraph: Tobacco giant Philip Morris has lost an international dispute surrounding the sale of cigarettes in Uruguay and must continue to cover packs sold in the South American country with graphic warning labels and restrict its branding practices, President Tabare Vazquez announced Friday.

headline.main: ‘This Has Pushed a Button’: Killings in Kenya Ignite National Outcry
headline.print_headline: ‘This Has Pushed a Button’: Kenyan Killings Stir a National Outcry

docs.snippet: The case of a lawyer, his last known client and a taxi driver, all last seen in police custody but later found dead in a river, has exploded like few others in Kenya....
docs.abstract: Killing of three civilians by Kenyan police officers has provoked intense backlash and widespread protests against notoriously corrupt law enforcement system; officers killed lawyer Willie Kimani, client Josephat Mwenda and taxi driver Joseph Muiruri in attempt to stymie corruption case lodged against them.
docs.lead_paragraph: The case of a lawyer, his last known client and a taxi driver, all last seen in police custody but later found dead in a river, has exploded like few others in Kenya.

headline.main: Protesters Nationwide Denounce Police Shootings of Blacks
headline.print_headline: Protesters Nationwide Denounce Police Shootings of Blacks

docs.snippet: A look at protests and related events nationwide and in the United Kingdom on Friday following the police shootings of black men in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, and suburban St. Paul, Minnesota, and the deadly sniper attack on police officers in Dallas...
docs.lead_paragraph: A look at protests and related events nationwide and in the United Kingdom on Friday following the police shootings of black men in Baton Rouge, Louisiana, and suburban St. Paul, Minnesota, and the deadly sniper attack on police officers in Dallas.
